page.title: 08THE BUS SERVICE.
page.content: There are a number of bus services in our block,some running through Lesbury and continuing south and others turning at Hipsburn and returning to Alnwick. There is a total of 56 services running through the block.We calculated this by counting the number of times each service ran through the block and adding the totals.Here is an example for the 420 service: {Service Days No. of buses. 420 M,T,W,Th,F,S 12 420 Sat only 1 420 Sun only 1 { TOTAL 14 From these 56 services,47 run south and 9 run north.The 420 runs south through Warkworth to Ashington and Bedlington.Several of these services connect with the rail services.
